title: 6.1.4 Create Helm chart templates
body:
## Parent Issue
#23 - 6.1 Container Packaging

## Objective
Create Helm chart for Kubernetes deployment on EKS.

## Requirements
- Deployment with configurable replicas
- Service for internal/external access
- ConfigMap for non-sensitive config
- Secret references for sensitive data
- Ingress for external access
- HPA for autoscaling

## Files to Create
```
helm/cloud-optimizer/
├── Chart.yaml
├── values.yaml
├── values-dev.yaml
├── values-prod.yaml
├── templates/
│   ├── deployment.yaml
│   ├── service.yaml
│   ├── configmap.yaml
│   ├── secret.yaml
│   ├── ingress.yaml
│   ├── hpa.yaml
│   └── _helpers.tpl
└── README.md
```

## Key values.yaml Structure
```yaml
replicaCount: 2

image:
  repository: cloud-optimizer
  tag: latest
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent

service:
  type: ClusterIP
  port: 8000

ingress:
  enabled: true
  className: alb
  hosts:
    - host: cloud-optimizer.example.com

resources:
  limits:
    cpu: 1000m
    memory: 1Gi
  requests:
    cpu: 500m
    memory: 512Mi

database:
  host: ""
  port: 5432
  name: cloud_optimizer

secrets:
  databasePasswordSecret: cloud-optimizer-db
  jwtSecretKey: cloud-optimizer-jwt
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Chart.yaml valid with version info
- [ ] helm lint passes
- [ ] helm template renders correctly
- [ ] Installs on local kind cluster
- [ ] README documents all values

## Estimated Time
3 hours
